items.content_html: Music Event Website Backend (Node.js, MongoDB) API-driven backend for a music event website. Manages: Event data (artists, dates, locations) User accounts (optional: ticketing & authentication) Secure communication with the frontend Lightweight & Flexible: Ideal for fast development and scaling.
